contents:
Your Result: Christian Democrat
 
88%  Christian democrats are paternal conservatives who generally support a free market economy with limited state intervention. Many also support corporatism, in which workers and employers work through collective bargaining agreements to cooperate and improve conditions for both. Socially, Christian democrats tend to be moderate conservatives, being in opposition to same-sex marriage and abortion while also opposing secularism to some degree. They tend to value the family and believe that it has its own individual autonomy in society.

 
79%  Neoconservative
 
67%  Paleoconservative
 
67%  Social Liberal
 
64%  Market Liberalism
 
55%  Fascist
 
53%  Social Democrat
 
34%  Authoritarian Socialist
 
22%  Anarchist
 
19%  Marxist Communist
